newsitem.title: USA: American Brands to up div after spinoff.
newsitem.headline: American Brands to up div after spinoff.

text.p: American Brands Inc said Tuesday it will pay a higher dividend to stockholders when it completes the spinoff of its United Kingdom-based Gallaher tobacco unit.
The company said it is currently considering a combined initial annualized dividend of $2.00 per share, while U.S. and eligible U.K. taxpayers will receive effectively an additional $0.30 per share.
The added benefit comes in the form of a refund or credit of the U.K.'s advance corporation tax that is paid by Gallaher on its dividends, it said.
The company's name is to be changed to Fortune Brands. After the transaction, the new Fortune Brands will consider repurchasing up to 10 million shares, it said.
